00027 CHighScores::CHighScores(int Episode, const std::string &DataDirectory, bool saving_mode) :
00028 m_Place(0), m_blink(true), m_blinkctr(0)
00029 {
00030  m_Map.setScrollSurface(g_pVideoDriver->ScrollSurface);
00031  
00032  // Set default Scores
00033  m_Name[0] = "Gerstrong";
00034  m_Name[1] = "Tulip";
00035  m_Name[2] = "Albert";
00036  m_Name[3] = "Pickle";
00037  m_Name[4] = "Pizza2004";
00038  m_Name[5] = "DaVince";
00039  m_Name[6] = "Katy Shaw";
00040  m_Name[7] = "The Fans";
00041  
00042  for(int i=0 ; i<8 ; i++)
00043   m_Score[i] = "100";
00044  
00045  memset(m_Extra, 0, 8*4*sizeof(bool));
00046  memset(m_Cities, 0, 8*sizeof(unsigned int));
00047  
00048  // Which process function will be cycled trough
00049  mp_process = &CHighScores::processShow;
00050  
00051  m_Episode = Episode;
00052  m_DataDirectory = DataDirectory;
00053  
00054  loadHighScoreTable();
00055  
00056  // Load the map for the background
00057  CMapLoader MapLoader(&m_Map);
00058  MapLoader.load(m_Episode, 90, DataDirectory, false);
00059  
00060     m_Map.gotoPos(HIGHSCORETABLE_X, HIGHSCORETABLE_Y);
00061  
00062     // Draw Background. This is only needed once, since Scrollsurface
00063     // won't be cleared every update screen
00064     m_Map.drawAll();
00065  
00066  // Setup the Bitmaps that will be shown
00067  stBitmap bmp;
00068  
00069  bmp.p_Bitmap = g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("HIGHSCOR");
00070  bmp.rect.x = 160-(bmp.p_Bitmap->getWidth()/2);
00071  bmp.rect.y = 6;
00072  bmp.rect.w = bmp.p_Bitmap->getWidth();
00073  bmp.rect.h = bmp.p_Bitmap->getHeight();
00074  m_Bitmaps.push_back(bmp);
00075  
00076  if(m_Episode == 2)
00077  {
00078   bmp.p_Bitmap = g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("SAVED");
00079   bmp.rect.x = 232;
00080   bmp.rect.y = 32;
00081   bmp.rect.w = bmp.p_Bitmap->getWidth();
00082   bmp.rect.h = bmp.p_Bitmap->getHeight();
00083   m_Bitmaps.push_back(bmp);
00084   bmp.rect.y = 36;
00085  }
00086  else if(m_Episode == 1)
00087  {
00088   
00089   bmp.p_Bitmap = g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("PARTS");
00090   bmp.rect.x = 232;
00091   bmp.rect.y = 32;
00092   bmp.rect.w = bmp.p_Bitmap->getWidth();
00093   bmp.rect.h = bmp.p_Bitmap->getHeight();
00094   m_Bitmaps.push_back(bmp);
00095   
00096   CPhysicsSettings &Phy = g_pBehaviorEngine->getPhysicsSettings();
00097   int joy_tile = Phy.misc.joy_tile;
00098   int bat_tile = Phy.misc.bat_tile;
00099   int vac_tile = Phy.misc.vac_tile;
00100   int wsk_tile = Phy.misc.wsk_tile;
00101 
00102   // Put the Tiles, of the parts that were collected
00103   if(!saving_mode)
00104   {
00105    for( int i=0 ; i<8 ; i++ )
00106    {
00107     if(m_Extra[i][0]) m_Map.setTile(98, 5+i, joy_tile+(i%4), true);
00108     if(m_Extra[i][1]) m_Map.setTile(99, 5+i, bat_tile+((i+1)%4), true);
00109     if(m_Extra[i][2]) m_Map.setTile(100, 5+i, vac_tile+((i+2)%4), true);
00110     if(m_Extra[i][3]) m_Map.setTile(101, 5+i, wsk_tile+((i+3)%4), true);
00111    }
00112   }
00113  }
00114  else bmp.rect.y = 32;
00115  
00116  bmp.p_Bitmap = g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("NAME");
00117  bmp.rect.x = (m_Episode == 3) ? 69 : 40;
00118  bmp.rect.w = bmp.p_Bitmap->getWidth();
00119  bmp.rect.h = bmp.p_Bitmap->getHeight();
00120  m_Bitmaps.push_back(bmp);
00121  
00122  bmp.p_Bitmap = g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("SCORE");
00123  bmp.rect.x = (m_Episode == 3) ? 207 : 154;
00124  bmp.rect.w = bmp.p_Bitmap->getWidth();
00125  bmp.rect.h = bmp.p_Bitmap->getHeight();
00126  m_Bitmaps.push_back(bmp);
00127 }
00128 
00129 void CHighScores::process()
00130 {
00131  SDL_Surface *sfc = g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface;
00132  
00133  // draw the Bitmaps
00134  std::vector<stBitmap>::iterator it_bmp = m_Bitmaps.begin();
00135  for(; it_bmp != m_Bitmaps.end() ; it_bmp++)
00136  {
00137   it_bmp->p_Bitmap->draw(sfc, it_bmp->rect.x, it_bmp->rect.y);
00138  }
00139  
00140  // Print the text of the highscores
00141  for( Uint8 i=0 ; i<8 ; i++ )
00142  {
00143   int x = (m_Episode == 3) ? 69 : 40;
00144   int x2 = (m_Episode == 3) ? 255 : 202;
00145   int y = (m_Episode == 2) ? 56 : 52;
00146   g_pGfxEngine->getFont(0).drawFont(sfc, m_Name[i],x,y+(i<<4), true);
00147   g_pGfxEngine->getFont(0).drawFont(sfc, m_Score[i],x2-((m_Score[i].size())<<3),y+(i<<4), true);
00148  }
00149  
00150  // Here it must be split up into Episodes 1, 2 and 3.
00151  if(m_Episode == 2)
00152  {
00153   for( Uint8 i=0 ; i<8 ; i++ )
00154    g_pGfxEngine->getFont(0).drawFont(sfc, itoa(m_Cities[i]), 252, 56+(i<<4), true);
00155  }
00156  
00157  (this->*mp_process)();
00158  
00159  m_Map.animateAllTiles();
00160 }
00161 
00162 void CHighScores::processShow()
00163 {
00164  if(g_pInput->getPressedAnyCommand())
00165   m_destroy_me=true;
00166 }
00167 
00168 void CHighScores::processWriting()
00169 {
00170  SDL_Surface *sfc = g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface;
00171  
00172  // Get the input
00173  if(g_pInput->getPressedIsTypingKey() && (m_Name[m_Place].length() < 13))
00174  {
00175   m_Name[m_Place].append(g_pInput->getPressedTypingKey());
00176  }
00177  
00178  if(g_pInput->getPressedKey(KBCKSPCE) && (m_Name[m_Place].length() > 0))
00179  {
00180   m_Name[m_Place].erase(m_Name[m_Place].length()-1);
00181  }
00182  
00183  if(g_pInput->getPressedKey(KENTER))
00184  {
00185   // Save the Table and change to show mode, which can be closed by any other key
00186   saveHighScoreTable();
00187   mp_process = &CHighScores::processShow;
00188  }
00189  
00190  
00191  int x = (m_Episode == 3) ? 69 : 40;
00192  int y = (m_Episode == 2) ? 56 : 52;
00193  if(m_blink) g_pGfxEngine->getFont(0).drawFont(sfc, m_Name[m_Place]+"_",x, y+(m_Place<<4), true);
00194  else g_pGfxEngine->getFont(0).drawFont(sfc, m_Name[m_Place]+" ",x, y+(m_Place<<4), true);
00195  
00196  if(m_blinkctr > BLINK_TIME){
00197   m_blinkctr = 0;
00198   m_blink = !m_blink;
00199  }
00200  else m_blinkctr++;
00201 }
00202 
00203 void CHighScores::writeEP1HighScore(int score, bool extra[4])
00204 {
00205  writeHighScoreCommon(score);
00206  memcpy(m_Extra[m_Place], extra,4*sizeof(bool));
00207  
00208  // Set the tiles if EP1 (collected parts)
00209  if(m_Episode == 1)
00210  {
00211   // Put the Tiles, of the parts that were collected
00212   for( int i=0 ; i<8 ; i++ )
00213   {
00214    if(m_Extra[i][0]) m_Map.setTile(98,5+i,221, true);
00215    if(m_Extra[i][1]) m_Map.setTile(99,5+i,237, true);
00216    if(m_Extra[i][2]) m_Map.setTile(100,5+i,241, true);
00217    if(m_Extra[i][3]) m_Map.setTile(101,5+i,245, true);
00218   }
00219  }
00220 }
00221 
00222 void CHighScores::writeEP2HighScore(int score, int cities_saved)
00223 {
00224  writeHighScoreCommon(score);
00225  m_Cities[m_Place] = cities_saved;
00226 }
00227 
00228 void CHighScores::writeHighScoreCommon(int score)
00229 {
00230  m_Place=6;
00231  int num;
00232  
00233  num = atoi(m_Score[m_Place]);
00234  if(num > score)
00235   return; // Sorry, but score not high enough
00236  
00237  // Enough Points,
00238  // change the Highscore config to writing..
00239  mp_process = &CHighScores::processWriting;
00240  
00241  while(m_Place>0 && score > num)
00242  {
00243   m_Name[m_Place] = m_Name[m_Place-1];
00244   m_Score[m_Place] = m_Score[m_Place-1];
00245   memcpy(m_Extra[m_Place], m_Extra[m_Place-1], 4);
00246   m_Cities[m_Place] = m_Cities[m_Place-1];
00247   m_Place--;
00248   
00249   if(m_Place > 0)
00250    num = atoi(m_Score[m_Place-1]);
00251  }
00252  
00253  m_Score[m_Place] = itoa(score);
00254  
00255  m_Name[m_Place+1] = m_Name[m_Place];
00256  
00257  if(score < 999999)
00258   m_Score[m_Place] = itoa(score);
00259  else
00260   m_Score[m_Place] = "*MAX*";
00261  
00262  m_Name[m_Place] = "";
00263 }
00264 
00265 bool CHighScores::loadHighScoreTable()
00266 {
00267  ifstream ScoreTableFile;
00268  std::string buf = "/highscoreep"+itoa(m_Episode)+".dat";
00269  OpenGameFileR(ScoreTableFile, m_DataDirectory + buf, ios::binary);
00270  
00271  if(!ScoreTableFile) return false;
00272  
00273  char c_name[8][16];
00274  char c_score[8][8];
00275  unsigned char c_extra[8][4];
00276  int c_cities[8];
00277  
00278  memset(c_name, 0, 8*16*sizeof(char));
00279  memset(c_score, 0, 8*8*sizeof(char));
00280  memset(c_extra, 0, 8*4*sizeof(char));
00281  memset(c_cities, 0, 8*sizeof(char));
00282  
00283  ScoreTableFile.read((char*)c_name, 8*16*sizeof(char));
00284  ScoreTableFile.seekg(8*16*sizeof(char),ios_base::cur);
00285  ScoreTableFile.read((char*)c_score, 8*8*sizeof(char));
00286  ScoreTableFile.seekg(8*8*sizeof(char),ios_base::cur);
00287  ScoreTableFile.read((char*)(c_extra), 8*4*sizeof(unsigned char));
00288  ScoreTableFile.seekg(8*4*sizeof(char),ios_base::cur);
00289  ScoreTableFile.read((char*)(c_cities), 8*sizeof(int));
00290  
00291  // Format the name to C++ Strings
00292  for(size_t i=0 ; i<8 ; i++)
00293  {
00294   m_Name[i] = c_name[i];
00295   m_Score[i] = c_score[i];
00296   memcpy(&m_Extra[i], &c_extra[i], 4);
00297   m_Cities[i] = c_cities[i];
00298  }
00299  
00300  ScoreTableFile.close();
00301  
00302  return true;
00303 }
00304 
00305 bool CHighScores::saveHighScoreTable()
00306 {
00307  ofstream ScoreTableFile;
00308  std::string buf = "/highscoreep"+itoa(m_Episode)+".dat";
00309  OpenGameFileW(ScoreTableFile, m_DataDirectory + buf, ios::binary);
00310  
00311  if(!ScoreTableFile) return false;
00312  
00313  char c_name[8][16];
00314  char c_score[8][8];
00315  unsigned char c_extra[8][4];
00316  int c_cities[8];
00317  
00318  memset(c_name, 0, 8*16*sizeof(char));
00319  memset(c_score, 0, 8*8*sizeof(char));
00320  memset(c_extra, 0, 8*4*sizeof(char));
00321  memset(c_cities, 0, 8*sizeof(char));
00322  
00323  // Format the C++ strings to C Strings
00324  for(size_t i=0 ; i<8 ; i++)
00325  {
00326   for(size_t c=0 ; c<16 && c<m_Name[i].size() ; c++)
00327    c_name[i][c] = m_Name[i][c];
00328   for(size_t c=0 ; c<8 && c<m_Score[i].size() ; c++)
00329    c_score[i][c] = m_Score[i][c];
00330   memcpy(c_extra[i], m_Extra[i], 4);
00331   c_cities[i] = m_Cities[i];
00332  }
00333  
00334  ScoreTableFile.write((char*)(c_name), 8*16*sizeof(char));
00335  ScoreTableFile.seekp(8*16*sizeof(char),ios_base::cur);
00336  ScoreTableFile.write((char*)(c_score), 8*8*sizeof(char));
00337  ScoreTableFile.seekp(8*8*sizeof(char),ios_base::cur);
00338  ScoreTableFile.write((char*)(c_extra), 8*4*sizeof(unsigned char));
00339  ScoreTableFile.seekp(8*4*sizeof(char),ios_base::cur);
00340  ScoreTableFile.write((char*)(c_cities), 8*sizeof(int));
00341  
00342  ScoreTableFile.close();
00343  
00344  return true;
00345 }
